statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ -7 \\ -7 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -52 \\ -12 \\ -12 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
